 It was more or less a joke. About internet porn. Though there are still some NC 17 movies made, most seem to get edited for an R rating though.
topics.author: 500757fd7f123b75a90003b1

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d439f16368724288b20000#post_53d439f16368724288b20000
The internet has largely killed the physical porn market, though there are still enough people like me who enjoy actually going out to buy dirty magazines and books to keep the stores running.

It could be an NC-17 movie, but Showgirls basically killed those movies.

"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d4396a6368724569890000#post_53d4396a6368724569890000
You can get away with a lot of violence, nudity and sex much less so. For instance while you can have bared breasts and asses, when was the last time you saw an R rated movie with an extended beaver shot? Also while you can show a penis, an erect penis is strictly forbidden. You know, despite the fact that anyone seeing an R rated movie is probably familiar at least on some level with the idea of an erect penis.
